RenoiseScriptingTool.Name: Automation multiplier Extended
RenoiseScriptingTool.Description: This script adds a context menu entry to multiply the current automation curve by a given value. Extended means that one can apply the operation to all patterns of selected parameter. Based on the work of the original author: It-Alien (Fabio Napodano) | napodano@napodano.com
